publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2641 Tommy Sheridan: Death of John McGrath-That the Parliament notes with regret and sadness the death of John McGrath; believes that he made an enormous contribution to Scottish cultural and political life, particularly through his work with the 7:84 Theatre Company, and conveys its condolences to his family.

S1M-2641 Tommy Sheridan: Death of John McGrath-That the Parliament notes with regret and sadness the death of John McGrath; believes that he made an enormous contribution to Scottish cultural and political life, particularly through his work with the 7:84 Theatre Company, and conveys its condolences to his family. Supported by: Robin Harper*
S1M-2641 Death of John McGrath (lodged on 24 January 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2641 Death of John McGrath (lodged on 24 January 2002) Michael Matheson*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-2641 Death of John McGrath (lodged on 24 January 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2641 Death of John McGrath (lodged on 24 January 2002) Irene McGugan*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2641 Death of John McGrath (lodged on 24 January 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2641 Death of John McGrath (lodged on 24 January 2002) Johann Lamont*, Elaine Smith*
